Eastforest Homes Internal Website

Eastforest Homes is a Kitchener, Ontario based home building company that specializes is single detached, semi and condo homes.

Purpose

The purpose of this project is to connect the employees of Eastforest Homes to the resources they need to complete work efficiently. This is also a tool to showcase employee news and to make the employee community stronger.

Author

Cassie Slack

cslackdesign@gmail.com

@cslackdesign

CSlack Design on Behance

Target Audience

The target audience for this intranet website is the entire employee base of Eastforest Homes. This means that content must be usable, and relevant to all levels of management.

  • Personas
